games.name: Quest for the Royal Jelly
games.blurb: An RPG-like adventure game of mystery and tawheed! A king charges Ibrahim with a quest to find and slay the adventurer-eating, divine-claiming Royal Jelly!

games.name: Find the Harf
games.blurb: Learn the Arabic letters, with proper pronunciation for tajweed! Find the Harf is an Android game is for kids aged 3-6. It has options so you can tweak the difficulty for your children.
